noun.description: A member of an indigenous people of North Africa. The majority of Berbers are settled farmers or (now) migrant workers.
The Afro-Asiatic language of the Berbers. There are several different dialects; some of them, e.g., Tamashek, are regarded by some scholars as separate languages.

adjective.description: Relating to the Berbers or their language.

origin: From Arabic barbar, from Greek barbaros foreigner (see barbarian).
